**MetroPT-3 Dataset**
: This dateset is available at the [KAGGLE repository](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/dhirajbembade/metropt-3-dataset?utm_source=chatgpt.com)

 *** 

It consists of multivariate time-series recordings obtained from several analogue and digital sensors installed on the compressor of a train. 

The data spans between February and August 2020 and includes 15 signals, such as pressures, motor current, oil temperature, and electrical signals of air intake valves

 | **15** sensors | **300,000** rows |
